des:
You can simply ask Alexa to control your Heyaxa products. After connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
(1) Download our “Heyaxa” app in app market then register an account;
(2) Configure our devices in “Heyaxa” app and change appropriate name for your devices;
(3) Enable “Heyaxa” skill, and you'll be navigated to “Heyaxa” login page;
(4) Follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
(5) Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
Alexa, turn on plug.
Alexa, turn off air purifier.
Alexa, set the air purifier speed to low.
Alexa, turn on child lock on the air purifier.
Alexa, turn off child lock on the air purifier.
Alexa, set the bedroom light to 50%.
Alexa, set bedroom light to green.
Alexa, show me the camera.
